text: You have always been the guy to look at for inspiration to work hard. Diwali night, Biswa‚Äôs pakoda party and Antaragni, you were always a great company to have. Hope you grow out of your long hair phase soon. All the best for the future bro. Also who the fuck takes bath everyday in a hostel?
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: You have always been the jolly fellow. Always smiling. Always ready to help. Thanks for all the positivity and wholesomeness you provided over the years üòä
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: Kaafi debates/discussions kiye hai tere saath.. Kuch intellectual kuch not so much. Nasho me sabse aage rehte ho hamesha. Congrats on IIMA. All the best. Chaapte raho.
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: Would like to thank your extroverted ass for adopting me, and for being the bad influence in college. You introduced me to a lot of things. Some were good (you know what) and some bad (Once upon a time in Hollywood). Fuckups toh hote rehte hai teri life me. The biggest one I remember was forgetting to register in time for a semester :P Thanks for making my 21st bday a very memorable one. Tere saath time spend karne me bohot maza aata tha. Hope to go on many more trips with you. P.S Stop judging my tv series choices
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: AUV me bohot kuch fuka hai saathme. Banane se jyada cheeze fuki hai :P Kaafi maze kiya.. kaafi kuch seekha.. Hope to see you in Bangalore üòä
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: You are always a very fun company to have. AUV, R6, Chennai ke beach pe jo tu paglaya, wing me, hamesha kaafi achi jami hai tere saath. Still in awe of your chugging capacity. Hope kabhi life me apne alarm se uth jae tu. Ab Bangalore me maze karenge..
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: Yo Palak! Paani chahiye toh bol bhijwata hun. You were my first lab partner in college and definitely the best one. From being a great company in those boring phy labs to roaming around in the sun trying to catch all events in the 1st Antaragni, you have been awesome to hang out with! Abhi toh treat dede.. Also bandi patali hai maine babe üòâ
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text:
Yo Priank,
Bohot maze kiye poore AUV and NIOT ki journey me. R6 was the bestt. Ab bangalore me milenge and hope to continue the fun :D
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: Yo Ram! Bohot tatti courses kiye hai saathme.. TA202 me mast kaam karta tha tu :P. Thanks for all the fun times we had. Hope to see you in Bangalore! Cheers!
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: Forever indebted intern ka resume theek karwane ke liye. AUV me bohot kuch seekha saathme, bohot kuch short kiya, bohot PCBs phuke. Was great fun. Tera never give up attitude bohot sahi hai and its going to take you places. It was also fun stealing namkeen packets from your stock.
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: Second year ke baad se hi tumse interaction hua achese‚Ä¶ Kaafi batti badhayi tune.. Some really easy (sinx) and some not so much. But thanks for getting me through EE200 and some other courses too. You have always been very hardworking and an inspiration for me a lot of times. We did the GRE prep together yet you ended up scoring a lot more than me :P . You are the only person I know who feels ‚ÄúPhD ke bina life incomplete hogi‚Äù. So all the best for that. Thanks for helping me make pro con lists to decide my life choices and then me doing something completely different. We have had a hell lot of good memories together, from Antaragnis, to drunk nights to studying together (rather you teaching me), going to the canteen together every evening. Hope to meet you before you go to Korea üòä
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: Tu nahi hota toh batti bohot mushkil ho jaati. Bohot RR suna hai tune mera. Pro con list bhi banayi. Koi fayda nahi hua :P Bulle ke saath bulla kaatne ka alag maza hai. P.S. Kuch ukhada nahi tune ESC201 ki 8 baje wali class jaake.
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: Thanks for tolerating all my ‚ÄúYaar light band kar sona hai.‚Äù I knew what the pinnacle of laziness is after I met you. From all the ‚ÄúPaani bharde‚Äù fights to handling all our drunk asses in Goa, after going ‚ÄúKabhi itni nahi piyunga‚Äù on the first day, its been one hell of a journey. Also intern ki resume theek karwane me aapka bada haath tha. Hope ab jym pe paise barbad na kare tu aur tera gala tarr hota rahe. Amreeka jaake bohot machana. Good luck bro. Thanks for being an awesome roommate.
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah

text: Antaragni ke alawa toh dikhte nahi the tum jyada, but Goa me bohot maze kiye tumhare saath. Especially woh baarish me geele hoke thand me, restaurant me jaakar garam soup peena. Kaafi sahi vibe thi us raat ki.
author: Nilay Nilesh Shah
